import React from 'react' import {Container, Col, Image, Row, Card, Button} from "react-bootstrap" import bigStar from '../assets/bigStar.png' const DevicePage = () => { const device = {id: 1, name: 'Iphone 12 pro', price: 25000, rating: 5, img: 'https://www.purposechurch.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/fpo400x300.png'} return (

{device.name}

{device.rating}

{device.price}
) } export default DevicePage //rafce
